* ( EV = Electric Vehicles )
I started this stock tracker with a few stocks on it already and then put it in
here some time ago and got hell of a response... So we've got 105 stocks listed
now to show the whole EV market. Thought you might find it useful.

Updating it all the time. EV pure-plays…
